_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

A bad person [an4.203:5.9]: Uses speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical
A worse person [an4.203:5.9]: Uses speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical
Encourages others to do these things
A good person [an4.203:5.9]: Doesn’t use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical
A better person [an4.203:5.9]: Doesn’t use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical
Encourages others to avoid these things.
